Englacial is building open-source infrastructure to accelerate our understanding of the Antarctic and Greenland Ice Sheets.

Our goal is to connect observational data sources to numerical models of Earth's ice sheets. We do this by building tools that make it easy for researchers to acesss data and reproducibly create comparisons against numerical models.

We're funded by [Astera](https://astera.org/) with a mandate to accelerate our understanding of Earth's ice sheets while doing 100% of our work in the open.
